document_data.name: Giraffe
document_data.mainbody: '''Giraffes''' were a species of exceptionally tall mammals.
document_data.Behavior: Like many herd animals, giraffes were a peaceful species and would flee in a stampede from whatever they perceived to be the greatest threat to their safety.
document_data.Combat: Giraffes were capable of delivering strong kicks with their hefty hooves.

Ecology.Habitats: Large herds of giraffes were known to roam the [[Chult]]an savannah.{{Cite organized play/LJ/A Gathering of Heroes Interactive}}

document_data.Trivia: Certain ''[[wand of wonder|wands of wonder]]'' could summon giraffes.{{Cite dragon/147/WOW Your Players!|40}}
